books.title: Crime and Punishment
books.author: Dostoyevsky
books.description: A psychological exploration of morality, guilt, and redemption through the story of Raskolnikov, a former student who commits a murder

books.title: Les Miserables
books.author: Victor Hugo
books.description: A story of the French revolution

books.title: Anna Karenina
books.author: Tolstoy
books.description: A tragic love story in Russia

books.title: Don Quixote
books.author: Miguel de Cervantes
books.description: The adventures of a dreamer knight

books.title: One Hundred Years of Solitude
books.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
books.description: The story of a family spanning generations

books.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
books.author: Alexandre Dumas
books.description: A story full of revenge and adventure

books.title: In Search of Lost Time
books.author: Marcel Proust
books.description: A novel tracing memories and the past

books.title: Moby Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.description: The story of a captain chasing the great white whale

books.title: Ulysses
books.author: James Joyce
books.description: A masterpiece set in Dublin over the course of one day

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel that critiques the British landed gentry at the end of the 18th century.
